Our Security Philosophy

Security is not an afterthought — it’s embedded in everything we do. From client communications to campaign data and analytics, we prioritise confidentiality, integrity, and availability.

  • Data privacy and GDPR compliance at all stages
  • End-to-end encryption for sensitive communications
  • Regular audits and vulnerability assessments
Learn About Our Security Approach

Tools We Use

Our technology stack is carefully selected to maximise security, transparency, and control. These tools enable safe collaboration and seamless client engagement.

  • Proton Drive & Proton Mail: End-to-end encrypted cloud storage and communications
  • Notion: Secure project collaboration with granular access controls
  • Stripe: PCI-compliant payments and subscription management
  • Two-factor authentication (2FA): Enforced across all accounts for added protection
  • Regular backups: Encrypted, off-site storage for critical data
Talk About Security

Compliance & Standards

Our processes align with industry best practices and legal standards to ensure your organisation remains compliant and secure.

  • GDPR-compliant data handling
  • ISO 27001-informed internal controls
  • Regular risk assessments and mitigation plans
  • Secure handling of client and partner documentation
Understand Our Compliance

Peace of Mind for Your Business

With Green Orbit Academy, your data and privacy are never a compromise. Our combination of tools, expertise, and best-practice processes gives you confidence to focus on growth, sustainability, and impact.
